title: Old Russian Watch Faces
summary: Watch face featuring original Cyrillic Numbers that were used to indicate time.
description: In partnership with world famous Typeface and Graphic designer Igor Mustaev, we are happy to announce our first model of &Watches watch face for Android Wear: Old Russian WatchfaceThis beautiful watch face highlights the original Cyrillic Numbers that were used by our Slavic predecessors to indicate time. You can see an examples of such watches in many countries on the ancient buildings.With Old Russian watch face we tried to bring a modern look to these ancient masterpieces.Available in Black only at the moment. We are aiming to bring Gray and White dials in the upcoming updates + options to choose watch hands in conjunction with a few other complications.Stay tuned for updates! Hope you like it! As we just started with our manufacture we will be more than happy to hear your feedback!
descriptionHTML:
In partnership with world famous Typeface and Graphic designer Igor Mustaev, we are happy to announce our first model of &Watches watch face for Android Wear: Old Russian Watchface

This beautiful watch face highlights the original Cyrillic Numbers that were used by our Slavic predecessors to indicate time. You can see an examples of such watches in many countries on the ancient buildings.

With Old Russian watch face we tried to bring a modern look to these ancient masterpieces.

Available in Black only at the moment. We are aiming to bring Gray and White dials in the upcoming updates + options to choose watch hands in conjunction with a few other complications.

Stay tuned for updates! Hope you like it!

As we just started with our manufacture we will be more than happy to hear your feedback!
